util.alg

Class Monoids<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.alg.Monoids<T>

  • public class Monoids<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Operations on monoids.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Monoids(Monoid<T> monoid)
      Creates a new instance to carry out operations on the specified monoid.

           Monoids.with(someMonoid)
          .fold(streamOfStream)

      • fold

        public T fold(java.util.stream.Stream<T> ts)
        "Multiplies" the given sequence of objects. This is the canonical reduction operation on the free monoid, see e.g. monoids in computer science.
        Parameters:
        ts - the values to multiply.
        Returns:
        the result of multiplying the stream of values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null or any of the contained objects is null.
